channel.title: Npc Multi Teleporting
channel.description:
Hello, I was wondering if anyone could help me out. I am trying to find some help on making a Npc that you talk to display a interface box that displays two different options that allow you to teleport to a few different areas.
Here are three pictures of what I'm trying to do.
http://img860.imageshack.us/i/70339904.jpg/ http://img839.imageshack.us/i/40016420.jpg/ http://img846.imageshack.us/i/79121934.jpg/
Thanks!
